content: P2P Lending Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 31 Oct 2018Has anyone used the P2P lending platform called SeedIn before?Understand that Funding Socities seems to be the most well received P2P lending platform, at least according to reviews on Seedly. But does anyone have experience being an investor with SeedIn? Would love to get some opinions on that platform. Thanks.1 answerAnswerBump0

Weina (Kaeley) TongLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 27 Feb 2019Hi there!Some existing investors have gone into detail on this Crowdfundtalks.Quoting one of them, "the number of opportunities are less in singapore @ 1 or 2 a month and the interest rate(s) are also on the lower end".0 comments1
